elements.text: You are on a long train ride and really hit it off with an attractive person sitting next to you. As the train ride nears an end, you think about how you would really like to see this person again. However, you worry that you might come off as being too...

elements.name: Asking Someone Out _Romantic Relationships_puzzle1
